projects.text: Designed and developed the official corporate website for WebSP, a digital agency. This project focused on creating a high-performance, modern, and fully responsive digital showcase. A key achievement involved rigorous performance optimization and advanced SEO strategies (SSR, optimized image loading, dynamic imports) to achieve Lighthouse scores exceeding 95% on desktop and significantly boost mobile Core Web Vitals scores from 20% to over 80%
projects.title: WebSP Official Website (UK)

projects.text: Developed a scalable web application for the Milton Keynes S.D.A International Church, designed to deliver personalized content and enhance member engagement. By leveraging Next.js for a dynamic frontend and Django for a robust backend, the platform seamlessly integrates powerful REST APIs for data interaction. This solution resulted in a significant 25% increase in engagement through targeted messaging and personalized recommendations for the church community..
projects.title: MK Int SDA Official Website (UK)

projects.text: A personal project exploring the development of a modern, responsive e-commerce platform. This site leverages Django for robust backend operations and Next.js with Tailwind CSS for a fast, component-driven frontend. While not yet fully functional, it showcases hands-on experience in building complex web applications, designing intuitive user interfaces, and integrating powerful frameworks.
projects.title: lakyshop e-commerce platform

projects.text: Developed a modern and highly responsive dashboard application using Next.js. This project focuses on providing users with an intuitive interface for visualizing key data and managing information efficiently. It leverages Next.js's capabilities for fast loading times and a seamless user experience, making complex data accessible and actionable.
projects.title: Next Dashboard

extra_projects.title: LakyPhone P.O.S
extra_projects.text: Point-Of-Sales desktop app built specifically for managing mobile phone retail shops. It is a robust, scalable, and powerful app with a modern design (Dracula theme). The newer version of this app(LakyPos) is general-purpose and can be used in almost all settings.  Built with Python, PySide, and CSS.

extra_projects.title: To Do List
extra_projects.text: This app helps users to manage and organize their tasks. Users can add a new task, re-arrange tasks using drag and drop, remove tasks, edit a task description, mark tasks as completed, and remove all the completed tasks. Built with JavaScript.

extra_projects.title: Book Store
extra_projects.text: Book Store is a simple Single Page App (SPA) that allows users to make add,remove, and update books with respective author. Built with react .

A simple course demo website that allows students to sign up for a course. It shows the details of the course including the lecturer, Course descriptions, and Course activities. Built with JavaScript.
extra_projects.title: Free Web Course
